attributes.action: force the daily mail to retract or apolgise for the article about the heroin addicts children being given to a gay couple.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the daily mail has claimed it would rather see a child live in a family setting with access to its addict mother as opposed to it going to live with a gay couple.

i see this as an insult to gay people everywhere, and based soley in the authors bigotry.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Press Complaints Commission.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
